api/parser.description: Detailed documentation for the slide parser module.

api/types.description: Technical reference for Slides Plus internals.

developer/architecture.description: Understanding the Slides Plus architecture helps you extend and contribute to the project.

developer/contributing.description: Thank you for your interest in contributing!

developer/extending.title: Extending Slides Plus
developer/extending.description: This guide explains how to extend Slides Plus with new features.

developer/intro.title: Developer Guide
developer/intro.description: Welcome to the Slides Plus developer documentation. This guide covers how to set up a development environment, understand the architecture, and extend the plugin.

developer/setup.title: Development Setup
developer/setup.description: This guide walks through setting up a local development environment for Slides Plus.

developer/testing.title: Testing Guide
developer/testing.description: Slides Plus uses Vitest for testing. This guide covers writing tests.

export.title: Export to PDF
export.description: Export your presentations to PDF for sharing and printing.

features.title: Features
features.description: Slides Plus provides a comprehensive set of features for creating professional presentations.

frontmatter.title: Frontmatter Reference
frontmatter.description: Complete reference for all frontmatter options in Slides Plus.

getting-started.title: Getting Started
getting-started.description: This guide will help you install and create your first presentation with Slides Plus.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Slides Plus supports Excalidraw, Mermaid, and LaTeX out of the box.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to Slides Plus, a powerful presentation plugin for Obsidian that brings the best of Slidev to your note-taking workflow.

layouts.title: Layouts
layouts.description: Slides Plus provides multiple layouts for different slide types.

themes.title: Themes
themes.description: Slides Plus comes with 6 built-in themes that adapt to your presentation needs.
